mosinstall.name: All-In-One New/Featured/TopTen/Random Products Module
mosinstall.author: soeren
mosinstall.description: Shows the newest/featured/best selling/random products from your VirtueMart.

param.name: show_new
param.label: Show new products?
param.description: Shows the newest products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_topten
param.label: Show TopTen products?
param.description: Shows the TopTen besteller products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_special
param.label: Show Featured Products?
param.description: Shows featured products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_random
param.label: Show random products?
param.description: Show randomly choosen products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_price
param.label: Show Product Price?
param.description: Defines wether the product price is displayed or not.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link?
param.description: Defines wether the Add-To-Cart Link is displayed or not.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
